Package controller

Class BattleHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.BattleHandler

  • public class BattleHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Angry makes Pokemon more likely to escape and more likely to be captured. Full makes Pokemon less likely to escape and less likely to be captured.
    Author:
    JohnXu
